Klaus Mueller.description: taking a break and going for a walk around campus (Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller discuss the intersection of physics and social justice, exploring the impact of technology on social justice issues and planning to collaborate on a project that combines physics concepts related to energy distribution in low-income communities with the potential of technology.
